suite.name: Kariyer.Baykartech

test.name: Visitor should be able click and see all "Footer" elements

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Verify Page Loaded
kw.doc: Verify all pages successfully loaded

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Scroll to end of the page
Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Navigate footer elements in loop
kw.doc: Clicks all footer links by created list

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Baykartech.App.Check Baykar's Main Site By Argument
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Check Baykar's Main Site By Argument

test.doc: All visitors should be able navigate footer links

suite.doc: This test file includes all tests for *kariyer.baykartech.com*, if you wanna change Browser or Runtime Language go to *Variables* section in this file.
